User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user (matches Firebase Auth UID).

email.description: The email address of the user.

Document.title: Document
Document.description: Represents a saved invoice or quotation.

name.description: The generated name of the document.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this document.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles. User ID is used for path-based ownership.

/documents/{documentId}.description: Stores all invoices and quotations for all users.
